localised_text.tooltip_text: Books of Nagash||View the locations and a summary of the nine Books of Nagash.

button_diamond.componentleveltooltip: Malakai's Adventures||Fight Legendary Battles and unlock upgrades for units and the Spirit of Grungni.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Malakai's Adventures||Fight Legendary Battles and unlock upgrades for units and the Spirit of Grungni.\n\n[[col:red]]Malakai's Adventures will become accessible on turn 5.[[/col]]

localised_text.tooltip_text: {{tr:treasury_header}}||View a summary of your trade and finances.

button_nakai_temples.componentleveltooltip: Temples of the Old Ones||View an overview of constructed temples and unlock powerful units and bonuses.

dy_intrigue.componentleveltooltip: Influence||This is the total amount of [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]influence available to your faction. It can be spent on recruiting [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords and [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes with powerful traits.

dy_time.componentleveltooltip: Marked for Death||There are many who believe that targeted violence is the ultimate method to achieve one's aims, and Alith Anar is no different. Anyone whose demise would benefit Nagarythe may soon find themselves Marked for Death.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: OathsMissionList.Filter(IsMissionAvailableInCurrentCampaign && MissionRecordContext.IsQuest == false).Count(MissionContext.Completed && MissionContext.IsCancelled == false) >= NumMissionsRequired && ExFinalBattleContext.MissionContext.Completed == false

(num_complete = OathsMissionList.Filter(IsMissionAvailableInCurrentCampaign && MissionRecordContext.IsQuest == false).Count(MissionContext.Completed && MissionContext.IsCancelled == false)) => { GetIfElse(num_complete >= NumMissionsRequired, "complete", num_complete) }
